title: आस्क फाउन्डेशन नेपालले सुरु गर्याे 'कोभिड एलिएन्स' हटलाइन सेवा
Press Release - Covid Alliance for Nepal - UK
desc: Leading Public Figures Call on UK Government for Oxygen for Nepal

title: ‘Urgent: Oxygen Needed’: Nepalis mobilise to take charge in Covid crisis
Why a group is signing a petition asking the US to provide vaccines to Nepal
desc: A group of Nepalis and US citizens of Nepali origin started the signature campaign after Washington announced it would share 60 million AstraZeneca vaccines with the world.
